description: This file defines marshmallow schemas for device data validation and serialization in a network management context, including validation functions, schema classes for device creation, update, and output, as well as serialization functions.

classes.name: BaseDeviceSchema
classes.description: Schema with common device fields and validation logic.

classes.name: DeviceCreateSchema
classes.description: Schema for creating a new device, inherits from BaseDeviceSchema.

classes.name: DeviceUpdateSchema
classes.description: Schema for updating device fields, all optional.

classes.name: DeviceOutSchema
classes.description: Schema for serializing device data from MongoDB, includes field mapping and timestamp handling.

classes.name: DeviceListOutSchema
classes.description: Schema for listing multiple devices with pagination info.

classes.name: ErrorFieldSchema
classes.description: Schema for representing field-specific error details.

classes.name: DuplicateErrorSchema
classes.description: Schema for representing duplicate error with nested error details.

methods.name: _ipv4_validator
methods.description: Validates IPv4 address format without external dependencies.

methods.name: serialize_device
methods.description: Serializes a MongoDB device document into API format.

methods.name: serialize_devices
methods.description: Serializes a list of MongoDB device documents into API format.
